mapper.select:
SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}
SELECT FROM t_base_subversion WHERE 1 = 1 AND f_subver_name = #{subverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT a.f_id AS f_mater_link_id,b.* FROM t_base_matersubvermap a LEFT JOIN t_base_subversion b ON a.f_subver_id = b.f_id WHERE a.f_mater_code = #{subverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t2.f_id AS f_id, t2.f_subver_name AS f_subver_name FROM t_base_matersubvermap t1 LEFT JOIN t_base_subversion t2 ON t1.f_subver_id = t2.f_id WHERE t1.f_mater_code = #{materCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t2.f_status = 2
